channel.title: Legislature on Thoughts

item.title: Uttar Pradesh background
item.description: Task Produce chart and maps data on Uttar Pradesh that could serve as slot in chunks for other reports on the state. Data Expected to be sourced from Wikipedia and Wikicommons and comprise open source user produced data that is freely shareable. Other information R packages used include magick1, rsvg2, rvest3, and, kableExtra4. Electoral calendar Table 1: Election calendar with focus on Uttar Pradesh Date Kind Election 2021 National Rajya Sabha 2021 State Vidhan Parishad: legislative assembly 2021 State Vidhan Parishad: nominated 2022 State Vidhan Sabha 2022 State Vidhan Parishad: legislative assembly 2022 State Vidhan Parishad: local authorities 2022 State Vidhan Parishad: nominated 2023 State Vidhan Parishad: teachers 2023 State Vidhan Parishad: graduates 2024 National Lok Sabha 2024 State Vidhan Parishad: legislative assembly 2025 2026 State Vidhan Parishad: teachers 2026 State Vidhan Parishad: graduates 1.
